tool_description: Explore data from more than 11,000 movies and 2,000 series easily with our API. Our movie collection is updated daily, giving you access to always-up-to-date information, including trailers and embedded videos. Available in languages: Spanish, English and Portuguese.
name: Global Movies Api Hub
title: Global Movies Api Hub
